info: Rating, 5 stars,  · May 2024,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment: We had a fantastic stay at this Airbnb! The communication with the hosts was great—they were very responsive and helpful throughout our visit. The property was perfect for our family, offering all the comforts and amenities we needed. The hosts were incredibly friendly and cooperative, making our experience even more enjoyable. We highly recommend this place to any family or individuals looking for a comfortable and welcoming stay!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · April 2024,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment: Good place to stay . Will return again

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · March 2024,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Dr. Roushon Ara was an extremely friendly host. On the day we checked in, we were greeted with brand new household items, such as drinking glasses and dining ware. However, cleanliness of the flat could be significantly better. Kitchen appliances were also dirty. On the other hand, the location is very close to the airport as well as local transportation (CNGs and rickshaws). Overall, good value.
